legendary_actions.desc: The aboleth makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.desc: The aboleth makes one tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Swipe

legendary_actions.desc: One creature charmed by the aboleth takes 10 (3d6) psychic damage, and the aboleth regains hit points equal to the damage the creature takes.
legendary_actions.name: Psychic Drain (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dragon must succeed on a DC 19 Dexterity saving throw or take 13 (2d6 + 6) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.
legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a Wisdom (Perception) check.
legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich makes a tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The dracolich beats its tattered wings. Each creature within 10 ft. of the dracolich must succeed on a DC 21 Dexterity saving throw or take 14 (2d6 + 7) bludgeoning damage and be knocked prone. After beating its wings this way, the dracolich can fly up to half its flying speed.
legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.name: Detect

legendary_actions.desc: The dragon makes a tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Tail Attack

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.
legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.
legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx makes one claw attack.
legendary_actions.name: Claw Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 feet to an unoccupied space it can see.
legendary_actions.name: Teleport (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The sphinx casts a spell from its list of prepared spells, using a spell slot as normal.
legendary_actions.name: Cast a Spell (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The kraken makes one tentacle attack or uses its Fling.
legendary_actions.name: Tentacle Attack or Fling

legendary_actions.desc: The kraken uses Lightning Storm.
legendary_actions.name: Lightning Storm (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: While underwater, the kraken expels an ink cloud in a 60-foot radius. The cloud spreads around corners, and that area is heavily obscured to creatures other than the kraken. Each creature other than the kraken that ends its turn there must succeed on a DC 23 Constitution saving throw, taking 16 (3d10) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A strong current disperses the cloud, which otherwise disappears at the end of the kraken's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Ink Cloud (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The lich casts a cantrip.
legendary_actions.name: Cantrip

legendary_actions.desc: The lich uses its Paralyzing Touch.
legendary_actions.name: Paralyzing Touch (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The lich fixes its gaze on one creature it can see within 10 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Wisdom saving throw against this magic or become frightened for 1 minute. The frightened target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lich's gaze for the next 24 hours.
legendary_actions.name: Frightening Gaze (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: Each living creature within 20 feet of the lich must make a DC 18 Constitution saving throw against this magic, taking 21 (6d6) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
legendary_actions.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The mummy lord makes one attack with its rotting fist or uses its Dreadful Glare.
legendary_actions.name: Attack

legendary_actions.desc: Blinding dust and sand swirls magically around the mummy lord. Each creature within 5 feet of the mummy lord must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until the end of the creature's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Blinding Dust

legendary_actions.desc: The mummy lord utters a blasphemous word. Each non-undead creature within 10 feet of the mummy lord that can hear the magical utterance must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Blasphemous Word (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The mummy lord magically unleashes negative energy. Creatures within 60 feet of the mummy lord, including ones behind barriers and around corners, can't regain hit points until the end of the mummy lord's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Channel Negative Energy (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The mummy lord magically transforms into a whirlwind of sand, moves up to 60 feet, and reverts to its normal form. While in whirlwind form, the mummy lord is immune to all damage, and it can't be grappled, petrified, knocked prone, restrained, or stunned. Equipment worn or carried by the mummy lord remain in its possession.
legendary_actions.name: Whirlwind of Sand (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The solar magically teleports, along with any equipment it is wearing or carrying, up to 120 ft. to an unoccupied space it can see.
legendary_actions.name: Teleport

legendary_actions.desc: The solar emits magical, divine energy. Each creature of its choice in a 10 -foot radius must make a DC 23 Dexterity saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) fire damage plus 14 (4d6) radiant damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
legendary_actions.name: Searing Burst (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The solar targets one creature it can see within 30 ft. of it. If the target can see it, the target must succeed on a DC 15 Constitution saving throw or be blinded until magic such as the lesser restoration spell removes the blindness.
legendary_actions.name: Blinding Gaze (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one claw attack or tail attack.
legendary_actions.name: Attack

legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque moves up to half its speed.
legendary_actions.name: Move

legendary_actions.desc: The tarrasque makes one bite attack or uses its Swallow.
legendary_actions.name: Chomp (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn makes one attack with its hooves.
legendary_actions.name: Hooves

legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn creates a shimmering, magical field around itself or another creature it can see within 60 ft. of it. The target gains a +2 bonus to AC until the end of the unicorn's next turn.
legendary_actions.name: Shimmering Shield (Costs 2 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The unicorn magically regains 11 (2d8 + 2) hit points.
legendary_actions.name: Heal Self (Costs 3 Actions)

legendary_actions.desc: The vampire moves up to its speed without provoking opportunity attacks.
legendary_actions.name: Move

legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one unarmed strike.
legendary_actions.name: Unarmed Strike

legendary_actions.desc: The vampire makes one bite attack.
legendary_actions.name: Bite (Costs 2 Actions)
